languages.text: "Деяния Домин отбрасывает тень на всех нас. Они не смогли жить в {mf|его|ее} сгустившейся тени. Мы — тверже, мы останемся с {mf|ним|ней}... Пока Неумирающий не даст знак".
languages.translation_comment:
Speaker Kibellah
Cassia: "I do not understand why some companions chose to leave the Rogue Trader — are we... doing something wrong?"

languages.text: "The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in the growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with the Domin... until the Undying One gives a sign."
languages.original_text: "Деяния Домин отбрасывает тень на всех нас. Они не смогли жить в {mf|его|ее} сгустившейся тени. Мы — тверже, мы останемся с {mf|ним|ней}... Пока Неумирающий не даст знак".

traits.locale_text: "The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in the growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with the Domin... until the Undying One gives a sign."
"The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in the growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with the Domin... until the Undying One gives a sign."
"The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in the growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with the Domin... until the Undying One gives a sign."
"The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in the growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with the Domin... until the Undying One gives a sign."
"The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in the growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with the Domin... until the Undying One gives a sign."

languages.text: "Die Taten {mf|des|der} Domin haben einen Schatten über uns alle geworfen. Sie konnten nicht in der wachsenden Dunkelheit leben. Wir sind stärker. Wir bleiben bei {mf|beim|bei der} Domin ... bis der Todlose ein Zeichen gibt."
languages.original_text: "The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in the growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with the Domin... until the Undying One gives a sign."

traits.locale_text: "Die Taten {mf|des|der} Domin haben einen Schatten über uns alle geworfen. Sie konnten nicht in der wachsenden Dunkelheit leben. Wir sind stärker. Wir bleiben bei {mf|beim|bei der} Domin ... bis der Todlose ein Zeichen gibt."

languages.text: « Les agissements {mf|du|de la} Domin ont jeté une ombre sur nous tous. S'ils ne pouvaient pas vivre dans ses ténèbres grandissantes, nous sommes plus forts et nous resterons à ses côtés... jusqu'à ce que l'Immortel nous adresse un signe. »
languages.original_text: "The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in the growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with the Domin... until the Undying One gives a sign."

traits.locale_text: « Les agissements {mf|du|de la} Domin ont jeté une ombre sur nous tous. S'ils ne pouvaient pas vivre dans ses ténèbres grandissantes, nous sommes plus forts et nous resterons à ses côtés... jusqu'à ce que l'Immortel nous adresse un signe. »

languages.text: «Las acciones de{mf|l| la} Domin nos ensombrecen a todos. No podían vivir en la creciente oscuridad. Nosotras somos más fuertes. Acompañaremos a{mf|l| la} Domin... hasta que el Inmortal nos lo indique».
languages.original_text: "The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in the growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with the Domin... until the Undying One gives a sign."

traits.locale_text: «Las acciones de{mf|l| la} Domin nos ensombrecen a todos. No podían vivir en la creciente oscuridad. Nosotras somos más fuertes. Acompañaremos a{mf|l| la} Domin... hasta que el Inmortal nos lo indique».

languages.text: 「ドミンの行いは私たちに不安をもたらせた。彼らは増大する闇の中で生きることはできなかった。でも我々は強くなった。不死の者が合図を出すまで、我々はドミンと共にあり続けるだろう」
languages.original_text: "The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in the growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with the Domin... until the Undying One gives a sign."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミンの行いは私たちに不安をもたらせた。彼らは増大する闇の中で生きることはできなかった。でも我々は強くなった。不死の者が合図を出すまで、我々はドミンと共にあり続けるだろう」

languages.text: “秘者的所作所为，让我们所有人都蒙上了阴影。那些人再也无法忍受日益肆虐的邪恶，但我们比他们更加坚强。我们会继续留在秘者身边……直到不死之神赐予我预兆为止。”
languages.original_text: "The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in the growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with the Domin... until the Undying One gives a sign."

traits.locale_text: “秘者的所作所为，让我们所有人都蒙上了阴影。那些人再也无法忍受日益肆虐的邪恶，但我们比他们更加坚强。我们会继续留在秘者身边……直到不死之神赐予我预兆为止。”

languages.original_text: "The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in {mf|his|her} growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with {mf|him|her}... until the Undying One gives a sign."

languages.text: "Domin'in eylemleri, hepimizin üzerine gölge düşürdü. Büyüyen karanlıkta yaşayamadılar. Biz daha güçlüyüz. Biz Domin'in yanında kalacağız. Ta ki Ölmeyen bir işaret gönderene dek..."
languages.original_text: "The Domin's deeds have cast a shadow over us all. They could not live in the growing darkness. We are stronger — we will remain with the Domin... until the Undying One gives a sign."
